thread.section_title: Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Convenient and Safe Location
thread.title_full: Convenient and Safe Location - Review of Fairfield Inn & Suites New York Midtown Manhattan/Penn Station, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: lmcandrew29
title: Convenient and Safe Location
text: Overall this is a nice hotel, it was kept cleaned, rooms were comfortable. Each morning they offered a very satisfactory breakfast. The staff in the breakfast area were very accommodating. We felt it was easy to get around from this location. We were able to walk to many places, like the Empire State Building. We even walked to Time Square. It may be a mile or so, but was safe. The subway was only a couple buildings down. Many restaurants and places to go close by.
